events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund because it does not fit me well.
The issue has been classified under 'Refund' based on the customer's request for returning the item.
The case has been assigned to agent Lisa M. who specializes in handling refund requests.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, may I have your order number and reason for return in more detail?
The order number is 987654321. I want a refund because the jacket is too small despite ordering my usual size.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the help and will send back the jacket as soon as I receive the label.
We have confirmed receipt of the returned jacket and processed the refund. The amount will appear on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was received correctly and if you need any further assistance related to this order.
Since your refund has been processed and no additional questions were raised, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting us.
We’d love to hear your feedback on your support experience. Please complete the short survey we just sent to your email.
